title: Vinnie Goodwill on 'NBA 75', the Lakers and more!
description:
Bomani Jones and Vinnie Goodwill of Yahoo! Sports discuss Russell Westbrook's effect on the Lakers (4:35), the most notable hits and misses of "NBA 75" (10:39) and more!
